price: او بېشكه موږ په دې قرآن كې خلكو ته هر ډول مثال بيان كړی، تر څو هغوى پند واخلي.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ḍarabnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
